## dapr status

Shows the Dapr system services (control plane) health status.

### Synopsis

Shows the Dapr system services (control plane) health status.

```
dapr status [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for status
  -k, --kubernetes   only works with a Kubernetes cluster (default true)
```
